desc: New Image Frontiers: Defining the Future of Photography reveals past, present and future trends in photography. From hardware to software, aesthetics to documentation, this book discusses current advances in photography and predictions for the future, including comments from top photographers and others in the business. Addressing the basics of photography as they are applied to defining photography’s future, the book’s content is culled from a number of important industry resources as well as interviews with master photographers.
title: New Image Frontiers: Defining the Future of Photography
